thread.title: Near-future Earth is looking pretty bleak in new Black Ops III trailer
thread.title_full: Near-future Earth is looking pretty bleak in new Black Ops III trailer

author: News Zombie
title: Near-future Earth is looking pretty bleak in new Black Ops III trailer
text:
Search for: Near-future Earth is looking pretty bleak in new Black Ops III trailer Posted on September 30, 2015 in PC News , PlayStation 3 News , PlayStation 4 News , Xbox 360 News , Xbox One News 
Players can get a look at what’s shaping up to be a pretty wild campaign in a new story trailer for Call of Duty: Black Ops III. As with the previous entries, there is a heavy sci-fi influence, what with the cybernetic augmentations, but a flash of anachronistic weaponry adds an intriguing twist. 
Call of Duty: Black Ops III is scheduled to launch on November 6 for PC, PS3, PS4, Xbox 360, and Xbox One. Note: “PS3 and Xbox 360 platform version features and performance may vary compared to other platform versions.” 
–
